title: Bolt Brand Guidelines (2025)
description: A fresh 2025 visual identity update for the mobility super-app, covering logo usage, color palettes, and typography for their expanding ecosystem.

title: United Way Brand Guidelines (2024)
description: Version 1.4 (2024). A massive non-profit brand book covering brand strategy, affinity groups, and digital platform standardization.

title: ScanSource Brand Guidelines (2024)
description: A clean, B2B technology distributor guide focusing on 'sharing vision' and foundational design standards for partners.

title: International House Brand Guidelines (2024)
description: June 2024 update. A cultural and residential institution guide featuring vibrant color systems and modern logo adaptations.

title: Sectigo Brand Guidelines (2024)
description: Cybersecurity brand identity manual focusing on trust, authority, and correct usage of security badges and logos.

title: Wiley University Brand Guidelines (2024)
description: Higher education identity guide covering athletic branding, academic seals, and Pantone color standardization.

title: Spotify Partner Guidelines
description: The gold standard for modern tech branding. Covers the 'Spotify Green', logo exclusion zones, and partner co-branding rules.

title: Uber Brand System
description: A seminal example of 'radical simplicity'. This guide demonstrates how to build a global brand with minimal assets and maximum flexibility.

title: Discord Brand Guidelines
description: A playful, community-focused guide featuring 'Clyde' (the mascot) and the unique 'Blurple' color palette.

title: Netflix Brand Assets
description: The definitive guide to the 'N' symbol and the iconic red. Focuses heavily on digital presence and motion identity.

title: NASA Graphics Standards Manual
description: The classic 1975 manual (reissued). While older, it remains the blueprint for modern minimalist and functional design systems.

title: Revolut Open Banking Guidelines
description: Fintech example showing how to display financial trust marks alongside partner logos in mobile UI.

title: Twitch Brand Assets
description: Guide for streamers and partners, focusing on the 'Glitch' logo and the vibrant purple energy of the platform.

title: FIFA World Cup 2026 (Dallas Host City)
description: Official 2026 host city brand guidelines detailing the co-branding rules, 'We Are 26' campaign typography, and local usage rights.

title: Liverpool FC Identity Refresh (2025)
description: February 2025 update. A digital-first refresh pushing the 'Liver Bird' to the forefront, simplifying the crest for mobile apps and global retail.

title: FIBA EuroBasket 2025
description: Official Brand Manual v1.0. Comprehensive event branding for the 2025 tournament, featuring court markings, broadcast graphics, and partner logos.

title: Sacramento Kings (NBA) Brand Book
description: 2023-24 Edition. A premier example of modern NBA team branding, covering court design, 'Beam Team' aesthetics, and digital social voice.

title: Adidas Brand Identity Guidelines
description: The definitive corporate manual. Covers the 'Badge of Sport', the Trefoil usage, and the 3-Stripes implementation rules across apparel and digital.

title: Nike Brand Guidelines
description: Strategic framework for the 'Swoosh'. Focuses on protecting brand integrity, athlete imagery rights, and the 'Just Do It' ethos in global marketing.

title: Puma Brand Guidelines
description: Identity manual for the 'Forever Faster' platform. Details the jumping cat logo construction, font usage (FF DIN), and retail store visuals.

title: Lululemon Brand Identity
description: 2025 Updated Style Guide. Focuses on the 'Sweatlife' philosophy, fabric technology naming conventions, and community event branding.

title: Under Armour Team Sports
description: Catalog and visual standards for team uniforms. Includes precise placement rules for the UA logo on jerseys, shorts, and performance gear.

title: The North Face Online Guidelines
description: Digital-specific guide for e-commerce. Covers photography styles for outdoor gear, technical specs display, and 'Never Stop Exploring' tagging.

title: Vans Brand Guidelines
description: Visual identity for the 'Off The Wall' brand. Features the iconic checkerboard pattern rules, skateboard culture imagery, and logo clear zones.

title: Manchester United Foundation
description: Brand guidelines for one of the world's biggest football clubs' charitable arm. Shows how to leverage the club crest while maintaining a distinct NGO identity.

title: Olympics (IOC) Brand Guidelines
description: The master document for the Olympic Rings. Extremely strict rules on ring coloring, background usage, and association with partner brands.

title: Gymshark Corporate Policies
description: Includes the 'Gymshark Standard' for supply chain and visual representation. A great look at how a DTC unicorn manages brand compliance.

title: Salomon Visual Identity
description: PowerPoint presentation detailing the Salomon 'S' monogram, the 'Time to Play' tagline, and mountain sport photography styles.

title: ASICS Runkeeper Style Guide
description: Digital product design guide for the ASICS app ecosystem. Covers UI components, accessibility colors, and motion design for fitness tracking.

title: Fila Brand Guidelines
description: Heritage brand manual focusing on the F-Box logo and the classic red/navy/white colorway usage in fashion and performance wear.

title: New Balance Licensee Manual
description: Compliance guide for partners. Details how to apply the 'NB' marks on third-party merchandise and maintain brand integrity in manufacturing.

title: FC Barcelona Brand Values
description: Identity system update (2024). Explains the 'More Than A Club' philosophy and the visual narrative used in their global digital expansion.

title: Juventus Rebranding Case Study
description: Deep dive into the controversial 'J' logo rebrand. Explains the shift from a football crest to a global lifestyle brand icon.
